pr_title: [CDAP-16850] Adds errors handling for input schema

timeline.bodyText: should onSchemaChange and actionsDropdownMap be marked as optional props in the plugin schema editor?
timeline.author: yukiej
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,9 +21,8 @@ <h4 ng-if="!HydratorPlusPlusNodeConfigCtrl.showNewSchemaEditor">Input Schema</h4
       <plugin-schema-editor
         disabled="true"
         schemas="HydratorPlusPlusNodeConfigCtrl.state.node.inputSchema"
-        on-schema-change="HydratorPlusPlusNodeConfigCtrl.onSchemaChange"
-        actions-dropdown-map="HydratorPlusPlusNodeConfigCtrl.getActionsDropdownMap(true)"
-        schema-title="'Input Schema'">
+        schema-title="'Input Schema'"
+        errors="HydratorPlusPlusNodeConfigCtrl.inputSchemaErrors">

timeline.message: Adds error handling for input schema
Adds error handling for input schema
